title: definevalue
author: definevalue
content: Looking for the L7s Bitcoin asic and any others potentially available that are producing a profit . . I'm not paying outrageous reseller prices I have 50k to spend an don't mind waiting to get direct from manufacturer. My electrical costs are locked in at 0.042/c per k/wh for the next 2 years so I might as well take advantage of the 200amp panel sitting in my garage not doing anything. Drop a post if ya got something for sale. Post here prior to contacting me. Much Thanks!

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: You can check this "Current list of ASIC miner manufacturer/distributor".There are two active manufacturer that sells cheap units the shop.canaan.io and shop.bitmain.com but check the Canaan they are selling cheaper their a1126 pro is around $480.If you are looking for used units try to contact offordscott

comments.author: definevalue
comments.body: Quote from: BitMaxz on November 16, 2022, 10:51:16 PMYou can check this "Current list of ASIC miner manufacturer/distributor".There are two active manufacturer that sells cheap units the shop.canaan.io and shop.bitmain.com but check the Canaan they are selling cheaper their a1126 pro is around $480.If you are looking for used units try to contact offordscottAppreciated! canaan is a new one i've been purchasing directly from bitmain for several years now. Since nothing good has come about with GPUs and crypto I figure go back to the ASIC sinkhole.
